description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Even when the undead strike, someone's gotta do the lawn!!  Mow the lawn before the zombies get you in this fun, yet heart-pounding, revisit of a Commodore 64 classic! Start your lawnmowers!
description.short: Even when the undead strike, someone's gotta do the lawn!!  Mow the lawn before the zombies get you in this fun, yet heart-pounding, revisit of a Commodore 64 classic! Start your lawnmowers!
